sqlMap.insert: insert into visitor (id, writer, blogId, contents, dateCreated) values(#id#,#writer#,#blog.id#, #contents#, #dateCreated#)
sqlMap.select: select id from visitor where blogId = #blogId# order by id desc limit 1
SELECT v.id as id, v.writer as writer, v.contents as contents, v.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM visitor v where v.blogId = #blogId# order by v.id desc
SELECT v.id as id, v.writer as writer, v.contents as contents, v.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM visitor v join blogs b on b.id = v.blogId where v.blogId = #blogId# and v.id = #id#
sqlMap.update: update visitor set contents = #contents# where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
